name: travel_delays
rows: Multi vehicle crash on I-95 northbound 1 miles NORTH of Exit 35: PA 63 WEST - WOODHAVEN ROAD. All lanes now open.
Downed tree in wires on ZEIGLER AV / HERMAN RD both directions between PROTZMAN RD and STUTZ RD. All lanes closed.
CARVERSVILLE RD / COLD SPRING CREAMERY RD / FLEECY DALE RD
Downed utility on CARVERSVILLE RD / COLD SPRING CREAMERY RD / FLEECY DALE RD both directions between BURNT HOUSE HILL RD and WEST BRANDON WY. All lanes now open.
Vehicle recovery/follow up on I-81 southbound at Exit 72: PAXTONIA/LINGLESTOWN. There is a ramp restriction.
Utility work on WYNNEWOOD RD eastbound between LATCHS LN and MERBROOK LN. All lanes now open.
Utility work on NEWARK RD northbound between BALTIMORE PK and POLO RD. There is a traffic disruption.
Road work on I-76 East. Shoulders are closed.
Flooding on PA 381 both directions between CLUB STABLE RD and LINCOLN HW. All lanes closed.
Disabled vehicle on US 1 northbound between Exit: US 1 BUSINESS - PENNDELL and Exit: PA 213 - MAPLE AVE. All lanes now open.
Crash on US 209 both directions between RACE ST and CHURCH ST. There is a traffic disruption.
Flooding on PA 372 both directions between RIDGE RD and CHURCH ST, STATE ST. All lanes closed.

Utility work on MCKNIGHT RD / EVERGREEN RD northbound between HOUSTON RD and SIEBERT RD. There is a lane restriction.
Flooding on LINGLE AV both directions between (LANCASTER County Line)+ NORTHSIDE DR and OATFIELD LN. All lanes closed.
Vehicle recovery/follow up on I-80 eastbound between .2 miles east of Exit 111: PA 153 - CLEARFIELD and 1.5 miles east of Exit 111: PA 153 - CLEARFIELD. There is a lane restriction.

Roadwork on I-579 HOV LN / HOV LN TO/FR MELLON AR RD both directions between Exit: BEDFORD AV /+ MARIO LEMIEUX PL and Exit: HOV LN TO/FR NORTHSHORE. All lanes closed.
Roadwork on HOV LN TO/FR NORTHSHORE both directions between Exit: MAZEROSKI WY /+ PNC PARK/HEINZ FIELD and Exit: LC TO PERRY HW. All lanes closed.
Utility work on I-70 westbound at Exit: WELCOME CENTER. There is a ramp closure.
Roadwork on I-279 northbound between Exit: EVERGREEN ROAD and Mile Post: 4.5. There is a lane restriction.
Utility work on I-76 westbound 0 miles WEST of (Beginning of I - 076) - Non Turnpike. There is a traffic disruption.

Utility work on US 1 northbound between DARBY RD, LANSDOWNE AV and WEST CHESTER PK. There is a traffic disruption.
Roadwork on US 222 northbound between PONDEROSA LN and CAMARGO RD. There is a shoulder closed.

Utility work on TURNPIKE RD / NEWPORT RD / BRUBAKER VALLEY RD / ELIZABETHTOWN RD / E HIGH ST / HIGH ST both directions between SPRUCE ST and LOCUST ST. There is a traffic disruption.
